AllowGlobs.description: Files must match one of these globs to be analyzed

BasePath.description: Specify what path to root result URIs in Sarif results with.

CommentsPath.description: Path to custom json formatted Comments file to specify languages

CrawlArchives.description: Analyze files contained inside of archives

ExitCodeIsNumIssues.description: Use exit code for number of issues. Negative on error.

Globs.description: Globs for files to skip analyzing

IgnoreRuleIds.description: List of rule IDs to ignore

LanguagesPath.description: Path to custom json formatted Language file to specify languages

OutputFile.description: Filename for result file, uses stdout if not set.

Path.description: Path to a directory containing files to scan or a single file to scan

RespectGitIgnore.description: Set to skip files which are ignored by .gitignore.

RuleIds.description: List of rule IDs to limit analysis to

Rules.description: List of paths to rules files to use

SkipExcerpts.description: Set to skip gathering excerpts and samples to include in the report.
